summary: A colorfull ENB that will eat fps!!!
descriptionHtml:
[size=18]Do you like [color=red]c[/color][color=blue]o[/color][color=yellow]l[/color][color=green]o[/color][color=purple]r[/color][color=orange]s[/color] as much as I do?[/size]



The goal of this ENB is to provide ultra sharp and ultra vivid colors in outdoor environment and more realistic and Dark indoor lightning.



[color=red]Features:[/color]

FPS-eating rain with water drip transparency distorsion
FPS-eating enhanced colors
FPS-eating depht of field
FPS-eating Light and shadows
FPS-eating picture sharpness
FPS-eating light refraction
FPS-eating everything else



Version 3.0
---> Better SSAO

Version 2.0
---> Even better colors
---> Enhanced & better night preset
---> Less intrusive lens flare effect
---> Better indoor lightning
---> Less agressive direct sun light
---> Better Depht on Field
---> Fix indoor smoke & indoor occlusion bug




[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37159-3-1394516456.jpg[/img]

[youtube]mda8QCS7hlc[/youtube]
[youtube]OZUKK9-7HA4[/youtube]



[b]Installation guide[/b]

Edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following values:
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1

Then
You need those files: enb_reference.bsa ,enb_reference.esp, light123.esp, rain_fog_storm_fix.esp and Remove Interior Fog V2

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29253/?]Remove Interior Fog V2[/url]
The easiest way to get all others files is to download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12549/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D12549&pUp=1]Jasmin enb v7_1[/url], unzip it and copy the mentionned files in your Skyrim install directory.

Then
Dowload [url=https://docs.google.com/file/d/0BxKFQnHslPs8bDVkMkl5Uk9aY3M/edit?pli=1]ENB binary 0.157[/url] ---> It is no longer availible on enbdev.com, so use the links I provided. Once downloaded, put it in the folder of the game's main executable.

(optionnal) There is a ambiant occlusion bug where some indoors objects became transparent. To correct it, just download and install this fix [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499]Surface occlusion fix[/url]

Then
In pause menu --->Options --->Display, turn your brightness all way down.



[b]Compatibility:[/b]

This mod is compatible with any mod that dosent modify the ENB files. However, I didn't use Realistic Lighting Overhaul, Enhanced Lights and FX or others Lightning modification mod. This means that SkyPretty ENB is compatible with those light modification mod, but it may looks differently to what I intend it to look.
This mod is fully compatible with Climate of Tamriel.


[b]Performance:[/b]

[color=yellow]Captain Obvloius[/color] has something oblivious to say: Strong computer needed to run SkyPretty ENB!

My RIG:
Core i7 4770K (0verclocked to 4.2GHz)
GPU: Nvidia GTX 690
RAM: 24 Go

My Skyrim
SkyPretty ENB
Every single HD texture pack I have found for Skyrim (Include, but not limited to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801//?]Texture Pack Combiner[/url])
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50875/?]Grass Field[/url]

My FPS
In some outdoor environment with a lot of pines and grass, my FPS drops to 45. In any others circomstances and other video-games they are at a rock-solid 60 FPS.


[b]Limits:[/b]

ENB binairies 0.157 dosent support dawn and twilight, so the transition between day and light may be strange and fast. Also, some water, but not all, may be too transparent (depending on your water mods). Some textures fail to load, but after one second, they are fully loaded.


[b]Recommanded mods:[/b]

If you want to put Skyrim visual quality to the absolute maximim as I do, just install those graphic quality booster mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801//?]Texture Pack Combiner (All files, max quality)[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31070//?]Dat Grass[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909//?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2674//?]Improved NPC Clothing - High Res[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul (with Hi-res texture pack)[/url]

Dont forget to look at my other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36865/?]Super Master Cheat of everything[/url]
